${ModID}:Slash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL Discard a card.

${ModID}:PickOff.DESCRIPTION: Base damage is !M! per enemy. NL Deal !D! damage to the enemy with the lowest HP.

${ModID}:TsunamiSigil.NAME: Tsunami Sigil

${ModID}:StormSigil.NAME: Storm Sigil
${ModID}:StormSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil aqualancemod:Finisher. NL Base damage is sigils in your deck multiplied by shards in enemies. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Flood.NAME: Flood
${ModID}:Flood.DESCRIPTION: The first time each turn you discard a card, draw a card.
